document.full_text: 'carson mccullers talks about love,' suzanne vega's mixture of nightclub act and theater piece at the rattlestick playwrights theater, is a funky ramble through mccullers's life.
document.title: theater review | 'carson mccullers talks about love': the alienated souls whisperer
